results.title: Changes in the lipoprotein profile during antihypertensive therapy.
results.text_hl: The beta-adrenoceptorblocking drugs @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Oxprenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010096 @@@oxprenolol@@@ caused a reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Hypoalphalipoproteinemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052456 @@@HDL cholesterol@@@ and an increase of total @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@.

citations.NLM: Helgeland A, Leren P, Kjeldsen S, Eide I, Foss OP. Changes in the lipoprotein profile during antihypertensive therapy. Acta Pharmacol Toxicol (Copenh). 1984;54 Suppl 1():75-7. PMID: 6711333
